text:
@CNN @JeffDSachs @CNNOpinion https://t.co/Ai0SYO5v1h
As France has confirmed an earlier case-12/27/2019 with positive covid-19 result, and it might not be the 1st case in France.  While Chinese 1st case was reported by doctor Zhang jixian at the same day. China just trigered the Covid-19 alarm for humankind.
